raw_mentions:
Here are the extracted sentences that meet the criteria:

FLAP inhibitors can be identified as those compounds which have an IC50 in the "FLAP Binding Assay" that is less than or equal to 1 μM, and preferably 500 nM or less.
Representative tested compounds of the invention were determined to have an IC50 < 1 uM, and preferred compounds had IC50 < 200 nM.
